overview: While spending a day together, childhood friends Kenzie (Kenzie Reeves) and Kristen (Kristen Scott) experiment with kissing each other. When that turns into a full-blown lesbian sexcapade and Kenzie's boyfriend (Charles Dera) catches them in the act, he later turns his angry frustrations to making sure Kenzie's holes are fucked good and hard. Kenzie eventually convinces him to try a surprise threesome with an unsuspecting Kristen, who happens to stop by to find a masturbating Charles. It doesn't take long for all to be on board in this wild romp of debauchery.
title: Caught in the Act
